text.value: Zelda told me she will be on the forest, at south-west of the village.
Before you go, you should take something from the store. There are rupees on the chest, take them.
Remember you can attack in four directions using ABXY, and dodge with RB.
Zelda is waiting for you on the forest.
A blink is enough to make a peaceful man a warrior.
In for a green rupee in for a red rupee.
I love playing banjo in my free time, my grandpa Pete Seeger was a good teacher.
I think everybody can be happy with a banjo in their lives. Am I right?
Hi Link! Did you go to the shop? There is good stuff there.

The entrance is forbidden, it's dangerous to go alone, only the strongest warriors can leave the village and explore It.
Make a favour to yourself, and stay safe in the village.
